page.title: 16A typical Doncaster Sunday!
page.content: A typical Sunday in{Edenthorpe}near{ {Doncaster}is a bit boring because there is hardly anything on the television. In the morning I usually get up at about 10 o'clock to 11 o'clock and have my breakfast. I have something like bacon, egg and beans. It lasts me up till about 5 o'clock when I have my dinner. I mostly have something like beef, Yorkshire Pudding, roast potatoes, and cabbage. Sometimes I wash my dad's car if it is dirty. Always on a Sunday I have a bath, after which I watch television for a bit. Then I have my supper which is usually something on toast like jam, baked beans, or cheese and onion. Then I go to bed at about 9 o'clock.
